page.title: 01THE AREA AROUND W.BRADFORD
page.content: Chatburn,Grindleton,West Bradford and Waddington are attractive places for people to live and work.It is a rural area,with farms supporting beef,sheep and dairy cattle on the fells and river pastures. The parishes are lively communities, supporting many social activities.The schools are well maintained,and in spite of a recent fall in the birth rate remain viable.There is a wide variety of wild life and tourism is an important activity.There is historical evidence of 5,000 yrs of manÂ£s habita- tion,and many existing buildings have been in use for 200-300 years. New estates of housing have been built within the last 30 years. Dwellings are well maintained,and life goes on generally untroubled.
